      • provideAction

        public MoverAction provideAction()
        Description copied from class: Behavior
        Provide the actions that an agent should perform according to the current conditions. This function is called at each tick to determine what action the AgentBody should perform. The function is then handled and executed by the AgentBody doAction function.
        Specified by:
        provideAction in class Behavior<MoverAction>
        Returns:
